verses.verse: אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <WH559> I said אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בְּלִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in mine heart לְכָה־ <WH1980> Come נָּ֛א <WH4994> now אֲנַסְּכָ֛ה <WH5254> I will prove בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> thee with mirth וּרְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> therefore enjoy בְט֑וֹב <WH2896> pleasure וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold גַם־ <WH1571> too ה֖וּא <WH1931> he הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> and behold this also [is] vanity
לִשְׂח֖וֹק <WH7814> of laughter אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> I said מְהוֹלָ֑ל <WH1984> [It is] mad וּלְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> and of mirth מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֥ה <WH2090> What עֹשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> doeth

תַּ֣רְתִּי <WH8446> I sought בְלִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in mine heart לִמְשׁ֥וֹךְ <WH4900> to give בַּיַּ֖יִן <WH3196> unto wine אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרִ֑י <WH1320> myself וְלִבִּ֞י <WH3820> mine heart נֹהֵ֤ג <WH5090> yet acquainting בַּֽחָכְמָה֙ <WH2451> with wisdom וְלֶאֱחֹ֣ז <WH270> and to lay hold בְּסִכְל֔וּת <WH5531> on folly עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I אֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> till I might see אֵי־ <WH335> how זֶ֨ה <WH2088> he ט֜וֹב <WH2896> what [was] that good לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> for the sons הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> of men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יַעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> which they should do תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> under the heaven מִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> the days חַיֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH2416> of their life
הִגְדַּ֖לְתִּי <WH1431> I made me great מַעֲשָׂ֑י <WH4639> works בָּנִ֤יתִי <WH1129> I builded לִי֙ בָּתִּ֔ים <WH1004> me houses נָטַ֥עְתִּי <WH5193> I planted לִ֖י כְּרָמִֽים׃ <WH3754> me vineyards

עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> I made לִ֔י גַּנּ֖וֹת <WH1593> me gardens וּפַרְדֵּסִ֑ים <WH6508> and orchards וְנָטַ֥עְתִּי <WH5193> and I planted בָהֶ֖ם עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> trees כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֶּֽרִי׃ <WH6529> in them of all [kind of] fruits

עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> I made לִ֖י בְּרֵכ֣וֹת <WH1295> me pools מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <WH8248> to water מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like יַ֖עַר <WH3293> therewith the wood צוֹמֵ֥חַ <WH6779> that bringeth forth עֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> trees

קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7069> I got עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> [me] servants וּשְׁפָח֔וֹת <WH8198> and maidens וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and had servants born בַ֖יִת <WH1004> in my house הָ֣יָה <WH1961> had לִ֑י גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Also מִקְנֶה֩ <WH4735> possessions בָקָ֨ר <WH1241> of great וָצֹ֤אן <WH6629> and small cattle הַרְבֵּה֙ <WH7235> also I had great הָ֣יָה <WH1961> had לִ֔י מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all שֶֽׁהָי֥וּ <WH1961> had לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> above all that were in Jerusalem

כָּנַ֤סְתִּי <WH3664> I gathered לִי֙ גַּם־ <WH1571> Also כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> me also silver וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold וּסְגֻלַּ֥ת <WH5459> and the peculiar treasure מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> of kings וְהַמְּדִינ֑וֹת <WH4082> and of the provinces עָשִׂ֨יתִי <WH6213> I gat לִ֜י שָׁרִ֣ים <WH7891> me men singers וְשָׁר֗וֹת <WH7891> and women singers וְתַעֲנוּגֹ֛ת <WH8588> and the delights בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of men שִׁדָּ֥ה <WH7705> concubines וְשִׁדּֽוֹת׃ <WH7705> concubines

וְגָדַ֣לְתִּי <WH1431> So I was great וְהוֹסַ֔פְתִּי <WH3254> and increased מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all שֶׁהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> more than all that were before בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> me in Jerusalem אַ֥ף <WH637> also חָכְמָתִ֖י <WH2451> also my wisdom עָ֥מְדָה <WH5975> remained לִּֽי׃

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after שָֽׁאֲל֣וּ <WH7592> desired עֵינַ֔י <WH5869> And whatsoever mine eyes לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not אָצַ֖לְתִּי <WH680> I kept מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not מָנַ֨עְתִּי <WH4513> not from them I withheld אֶת־ <WH853> לִבִּ֜י <WH3820> not my heart מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any שִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> from any joy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לִבִּ֤י <WH3820> for my heart שָׂמֵ֙חַ֙ <WH8055> cheer up מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all עֲמָלִ֔י <WH5999> in all my labour וְזֶֽה־ <WH2088> and this הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become חֶלְקִ֖י <WH2506> and this was my portion מִכָּל־ <WH3605> for all עֲמָלִֽי׃ <WH5999> of all my labour

וּפָנִ֣יתִֽי <WH6437> Then I looked אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשַׂי֙ <WH4639> on all the works שֶֽׁעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> had wrought יָדַ֔י <WH3027> that my hands וּבֶֽעָמָ֖ל <WH5999> and on the labour שֶׁעָמַ֣לְתִּי <WH5998> that I had laboured לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> to do וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all הֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH1892> and behold all [was] vanity וּרְע֣וּת <WH7469> and vexation ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> of spirit וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there יִתְר֖וֹן <WH3504> and [there was] no profit תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

וּפָנִ֤יתִֽי <WH6437> And I turned אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לִרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> myself to behold חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> wisdom וְהוֹלֵל֖וֹת <WH1947> and madness וְסִכְל֑וּת <WH5531> and folly כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for מֶ֣ה <WH4100> what הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> for what [can] the man שֶׁיָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> [do] that cometh אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what כְּבָ֖ר <WH3528> has already עָשֽׂוּהוּ׃ <WH6213> done

וְרָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> Then I saw אָ֔נִי <WH589> I שֶׁיֵּ֥שׁ <WH3426> that יִתְר֛וֹן <WH3504> excelleth לַֽחָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> wisdom מִן־ <WH4480> at הַסִּכְל֑וּת <WH5531> folly כִּֽיתְר֥וֹן <WH3504> excelleth הָא֖וֹר <WH216> as far as light מִן־ <WH4480> at הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> darkness

הֶֽחָכָם֙ <WH2450> The wise man's עֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> eyes בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> [are] in his head וְהַכְּסִ֖יל <WH3684> but the fool בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness הוֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> walketh וְיָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> and I myself perceived גַם־ <WH1571> and yet אָ֔נִי <WH589> I שֶׁמִּקְרֶ֥ה <WH4745> event אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> also that one יִקְרֶ֥ה <WH7136> happeneth אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> both

וְאָמַ֨רְתִּֽי <WH559> said אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I בְּלִבִּ֗י <WH3820> I in my heart כְּמִקְרֵ֤ה <WH4745> As it happeneth הַכְּסִיל֙ <WH3684> to the fool גַּם־ <WH1571> even to me אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יִקְרֵ֔נִי <WH7136> so it happeneth וְלָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why חָכַ֛מְתִּי <WH2449> wise אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יוֹתֵ֑ר <WH3148> and why was I then more וְדִבַּ֣רְתִּי <WH1696> ? Then I said בְלִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in my heart שֶׁגַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> that this also [is] vanity

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For אֵ֨ין <WH369> there זִכְר֧וֹן <WH2146> For [there is] no remembrance לֶחָכָ֛ם <WH2450> of the wise עִֽם־ <WH5973> more than הַכְּסִ֖יל <WH3684> of the fool לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever בְּשֶׁכְּבָ֞ר <WH3528> seeing that which now הַיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> [is] in the days הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> to come הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all נִשְׁכָּ֔ח <WH7911> shall all be forgotten וְאֵ֛יךְ <WH349> and how יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> And how dieth הֶחָכָ֖ם <WH2450> the wise עִֽם־ <WH5973> alike הַכְּסִֽיל׃ <WH3684> [man]? as the fool

וְשָׂנֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH8130> Therefore I hated אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> life כִּ֣י <WH3588> because רַ֤ע <WH7451> [is] grievous עָלַי֙ <WH5921> for הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> because the work שֶׁנַּעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that is wrought תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> everything הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> unto me for all [is] vanity וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit

וְשָׂנֵ֤אתִֽי <WH8130> Yea I hated אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָלִ֔י <WH5999> all my labour שֶׁאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עָמֵ֖ל <WH6001> which I had taken תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun שֶׁ֣אַנִּיחֶ֔נּוּ <WH3240> because I should leave לָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> it unto the man שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will come אַחֲרָֽי׃ <WH310> that shall be after

וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יוֹדֵ֗עַ <WH3045> And who knoweth הֶֽחָכָ֤ם <WH2450> whether he shall be a wise יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become א֣וֹ <WH176> or סָכָ֔ל <WH5530> foolish וְיִשְׁלַט֙ <WH7980> over בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָלִ֔י <WH5999> over all my labour שֶֽׁעָמַ֥לְתִּי <WH5998> wherein I have laboured וְשֶׁחָכַ֖מְתִּי <WH2449> and wherein I have shewed myself wise תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> This [is] also vanity

וְסַבּ֥וֹתִֽי <WH5437> Therefore I went about אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I לְיַאֵ֣שׁ <WH2976> to despair אֶת־ <WH853> לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> my heart עַ֚ל <WH5921> of כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶ֣עָמָ֔ל <WH5999> of all the labour שֶׁעָמַ֖לְתִּי <WH5998> which I took תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

כִּי־ <WH3588> When יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> For there is אָדָ֗ם <WH120> a man שֶׁעֲמָל֛וֹ <WH5999> whose labour בְּחָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> [is] in wisdom וּבְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and in knowledge וּבְכִשְׁר֑וֹן <WH3788> and in equity וּלְאָדָ֞ם <WH120> yet to a man שֶׁלֹּ֤א <WH3808> not עָֽמַל־ <WH5998> that hath not laboured בּוֹ֙ יִתְּנֶ֣נּוּ <WH5414> therein shall he leave חֶלְק֔וֹ <WH2506> it [for] his portion גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> This also [is] vanity וְרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> evil רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> and a great

כִּ֠י <WH3588> For מֶֽה־ <WH4100> what הֹוֶ֤ה <WH1933> For what hath לָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> man בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָל֔וֹ <WH5999> of all his labour וּבְרַעְי֖וֹן <WH7475> and of the vexation לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> of his heart שֶׁה֥וּא <WH1931> wherein עָמֵ֖ל <WH6001> he hath laboured תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

כִּ֧י <WH3588> Because כָל־ <WH3605> all יָמָ֣יו <WH3117> For all his days מַכְאֹבִ֗ים <WH4341> [are] sorrows וָכַ֙עַס֙ <WH3708> grief עִנְיָנ֔וֹ <WH6045> and his travail גַּם־ <WH1571> even בַּלַּ֖יְלָה <WH3915> in the night לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁכַ֣ב <WH7901> taketh not rest לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> yea his heart גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> This is also vanity הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

אֵֽין־ <WH369> There ט֤וֹב <WH2896> [There is] nothing better בָּאָדָם֙ <WH120> for a man שֶׁיֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> [than] that he should eat וְשָׁתָ֔ה <WH8354> and drink וְהֶרְאָ֧ה <WH3318> after אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> and [that] he should make his soul ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good בַּעֲמָל֑וֹ <WH5999> in his labour גַּם־ <WH1571> also זֹה֙ <WH2090> This רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> enjoy אָ֔נִי <WH589> I כִּ֛י <WH3588> is from מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> that it [was] from the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he
כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֥י <WH4310> who יֹאכַ֛ל <WH398> For who can eat וּמִ֥י <WH4310> and who יָח֖וּשׁ <WH2363> or who else can hasten ח֥וּץ <WH2351> [hereunto] more מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For לְאָדָם֙ <WH120> to a man שֶׁטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> that [is] good לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> in his sight נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> For [God] giveth חָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> wisdom וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and knowledge וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> and joy וְלַחוֹטֶא֩ <WH2398> but to the sinner נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> he giveth עִנְיָ֜ן <WH6045> travail לֶאֱס֣וֹף <WH622> to gather וְלִכְנ֗וֹס <WH3664> and to heap up לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> that he may give לְטוֹב֙ <WH2896> to [him that is] good לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> This also [is] vanity וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit
